name: TextCycle
description:
TextCycle is a Bike Racing Text Adventure, in which you try to make it to the first position by the end of the race. Many obstacles await you, which you have to overcome by choosing the right way to act.

There are 5 different actions you can take in each situation:

Pedal: Go at a competitive speed

Sprint: Give it your all and push to your limits

Rest: Slow down or at least stop pedalling for a moment

Fix: If something is broken you might need to fix it

Jump: Some obstacles might require you to jump over them

Depending on what you choose to do in which situation you will get different outcomes.

Now roll up to the start and show that you are the best bike racer ever! Good luck!
